product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner features a feminine and luxurious jewelry advertisement with a soft pastel background consisting of gradient shades of blush pink with abstract circular and wave accents. The visually balanced layout includes a prominent brand name (`brand_name`) at the top in bold uppercase typography. Just below, the product title (`heading`) is displayed in serif, giving a modern elegant aesthetic. Key product features (`description`) are listed in a neat bullet format on the left. To the right, a high-quality image of the earrings (`product_image`) is centrally placed for visual focus. Below, the price element (`price`) stands out prominently. Buyer trust is established with a customer rating (`rating`). A strong call-to-action button (`cta`) with a solid background (`cta_background`) anchors the design.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF5F5`
- Blush Pink: `#FFC0CB`
- Dusty Rose: `#A8456B`
- Rose Mauve: `#C15B7B`
- Warm Brown: `#6D4C57`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings that combine soft femininity with sparkling elegance. The primary color is a rose gold pink (#F4A7A7), forming the metal base and floral design, which offers a warm, luxurious feel. Accents of pastel pink (#FADCDC) are used in the petal-shaped components, enhancing the feminine appeal. Clear white (#FFFFFF) and ice silver (#DCE1E3) crystals add brilliance and contrast, making the design pop with visual clarity. These colors are beautifully balanced—the rose gold blends smoothly with pink hues while the crystals stand out, ensuring elegance with a touch of glam. Ideal for soft, elegant banner designs.
